name: Misericordetta
description:
An Injustice at the Abbey!

Sister Hedwig is an anchoress - a religious figure who has vowed to stay locked in the same room for the rest of her life as an act of devotion - at Linbarrow Abbey, a remote convent in the moors of England.

This quiet life of meditation and solitude is broken one day when the abbess comes to her with a most unusual request...

Misericordetta is a short (~20-30min), tongue-in-cheek adventure-style game very, very loosely based on the historical mystery visual novel Misericorde: Volume One, by xeecee, available now on Itch and Steam. While this contains no explicit spoilers, reading through the novel first is highly recommended.

Some strong language is included in this game.

This game is optimized for desktop browsers in landscape orientation. Mobile browsers in landscape are supported and should be fine for the most part, but some size issues may occur, especially if not played in fullscreen.

Characters and setting originally by xeecee

Music, sound, and character portraits provided by xeecee
